data.comment: Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima starts the match. Vasco da Gama with the kick-off in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama drive forward but German Cano is judged offside.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 6, The match at São Januario has been interrupted briefly for a check on Leonardo Gil, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Vasco da Gama's Leonardo Gil looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama push forward at São Januario and Yago Pikachu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fortaleza defence.
In the minute 11, Vasco da Gama's Neto Borges gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 12, Fortaleza push upfield and Jackson gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Vasco da Gama defence.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Fortaleza.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 16, German Cano (Vasco da Gama) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Fortaleza defenders.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 19, Free kick Fortaleza.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 26, Fortaleza push forward at São Januario and Bruno Melo gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Vasco da Gama defence.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 28, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Fortaleza's area.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Fortaleza at São Januario.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 32, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo Alves (Vasco da Gama) gets a yellow card.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 34, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In Rio de Janeiro, Romarinho of Fortaleza is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza are coming forward and Romarinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Romarinho of Fortaleza gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Leo Matos is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
Romarinho (Fortaleza) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 44, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at São Januario.
The second half is underway in Rio de Janeiro - Fortaleza with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Vasco da Gama make their first substitution with Gustavo Torres replacing Talles Magno.
Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 49, Vasco da Gama push upfield and Gustavo Torres gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Fortaleza defence.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro Fortaleza attack through Carlinhos. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima blows against Fortaleza's Marlon for offside.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at São Januario.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Werley gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 54, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
German Cano (Vasco da Gama) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 55, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 58, Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at São Januario.
In the minute 60, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 62, Fortaleza's Marlon gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
Throw-in for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 66, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Jackson returns to the field for Fortaleza after picking up a slight injury.
Jackson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 67, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fortaleza drive upfield and Romarinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
Bergson is replacing Wellington Paulista for the away team.
In the minute 68, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fortaleza's half?
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama's Gustavo Torres is on target but unsuccessful.
Yago Pikachu (Vasco da Gama) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 72, Fortaleza's Bergson gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 76, Fortaleza's Juninho misses with an attempt on goal.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Igor Torres is on a sub for Marlon for Fortaleza.
The away team replace Romarinho with Mariano Vazquez.
In the minute 79, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Fortaleza.
Vasco da Gama are pushing forward but Leonardo Gil's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
The home team replace Leo Matos with Cayo Henrique Nascimento Ferreira.
Marcos Junior is replacing Leonardo Gil for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 82, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
Marcelo Chamusca is making the team's fourth substitution at São Januario with Derley replacing Ronald.
In the minute 84, Wanderson is replacing David for the away team.
In Rio de Janeiro, Bergson (Fortaleza) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Bergson of Fortaleza smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Fortaleza are pushing forward but Tinga's finish is wide of the goal.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 88, Bergson (Fortaleza) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 89, Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) is making a fourth substitution, with Vinicius replacing Yago Pikachu.
Bergson for Fortaleza gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Important block from the Fortaleza defence as Vinicius fires in a strike for Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Fortaleza.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
